LanguageData.PF_ShowProcessIconTooltip: If enabled allows showing of process icon on buildings that have it enabled, otherwise will never show icons on buildings (default: true)
LanguageData.PF_ProcessIconSizeTooltip: Sets the size for the process icon that is shown on some processing buildings (default: 60%)
LanguageData.PF_ShowCurrentQualityIconTooltip: Shows an icon next to the progress bar that indicates the current quality of the product (default: true)
LanguageData.PF_ShowTargetQualityIconTooltip: Shows an icon next to the process icon that indicates the target quality set, only works if 'show process icon' is true (default: false)
LanguageData.PF_SingleItemIconTooltip: If enabled will use icons that resemble a single item, otherwise will use icons that resemble a full stack (default: true)
LanguageData.PF_ProductIconTooltip: Displays icons next to products in the process selection inspector tab
LanguageData.PF_IngredientIconTooltip: Displays icons next to ingredients in the process selection inspector tab
LanguageData.PF_initialProcessStateTooltip: This setting controls how newly built processors have their processes toggled
LanguageData.PF_firstOnlyTooltip: Only the first process on newly built processors is enabled
LanguageData.PF_allEnabledTooltip: All processes on newly built processors are enabled
LanguageData.PF_allDisabledTooltip: All processes on newly built processors are disabled
LanguageData.PF_defaultQualityTooltip: Which target quality is set by default for processes that use quality
LanguageData.PF_replaceDestroyedProcessorsTooltip: Some processes destroy the processor, enabling this option will place a blueprint if that happens
LanguageData.PF_ReplaceVanillaBarrelsTooltip: Replaces all vanilla fermenting barrels for the PF ones, intended to be used after adding PF to an existing game, not multiplayer safe
LanguageData.PF_emptyNow: Designates this processor to be emptied
LanguageData.PF_emptyNowDescription: Designates this processor to be emptied by colonists, no matter what quality has been reached
LanguageData.PF_dontEmptyDescription: Cancels the designation for this processor to be emptied
LanguageData.PF_SetQualityDesc: Fixer l'objectif de qualité pour le processus.
LanguageData.PF_OldBarrelInspectString: Vieux tonneau 'vanilla', à installer n'importe où pour le remplacer par un fermenteur universel
LanguageData.PF_DestroyChanceTooltip: Le processus risque d'être détruit lors de la récupération du produit.
LanguageData.PF_EfficiencyTooltip: Quantité d'ingrédient nécessaire pour un produit
LanguageData.PF_CreatingTooltip2_Quality: \nTemps de traitement pour la plus mauvaise qualité: {TOAWFUL}.\n
LanguageData.PF_CreatingTooltip4: Température sûre: {MIN}~{MAX}.\nTaux de déchet: {PERHOUR} / degré / hr\n
LanguageData.PF_CreatingTooltip6: Se gâte ! La Température est de {0}!
LanguageData.PF_QualityTooltipNA: {PRODUCT_label} est toujours de la même qualité.
